vulnerabilities.title: Missing Content-Security-Policy
vulnerabilities.description: No CSP header found — increases risk of XSS and data injection.
vulnerabilities.remediation: Add a restrictive Content-Security-Policy. Example: Content-Security-Policy: default-src 'self'; script-src 'self' https://trusted-cdn.example.com; object-src 'none';

vulnerabilities.title: Missing HSTS header
vulnerabilities.description: Strict-Transport-Security not set; site may allow insecure connections.

vulnerabilities.title: Missing clickjacking protection
vulnerabilities.description: No X-Frame-Options or CSP frame-ancestors; page may be embedded in frames.
vulnerabilities.remediation: Add X-Frame-Options: DENY or set CSP frame-ancestors 'none'.

vulnerabilities.title: Missing X-Content-Type-Options
vulnerabilities.description: No X-Content-Type-Options header; some MIME sniffing risk remains.

vulnerabilities.title: Missing Permissions-Policy (Feature-Policy)
vulnerabilities.description: No Permissions-Policy found — site may expose unnecessary features.
vulnerabilities.remediation: Add Permissions-Policy header to restrict camera/gyroscope/usb etc. to trusted origins.

subject.O: Internet Corporation for Assigned Names and Numbers

issuer.CN: DigiCert Global G3 TLS ECC SHA384 2020 CA1

ai.summary: AI suggestions unavailable right now. You can still review manual findings.
